nodes.text: The Reprisal was a Dreadnaught-class heavy cruiser of the Imperial Navy.
The Reprisal had a long service life typical of the class, and had visited Kessel at some point prior to the Runaway Droid Ride.

By 8 ABY, the Reprisal was part of Warlord Zsinj's fleet and was deployed at Comkin V in the failed attempt to capture the Millennium Falsehood. Her bow shields were softened by an explosive package disguised as debris launched by the Millennium Falsehood. The ship was then finished by a salvo of 14 proton torpedoes launched by the seven T-65 X-wing starfighters of Wraith Squadron.
